tasktexts.tasktext: Gebe alle Zutaten aus, die man für die Herstellung eines 'Weak Health Potion' benötigt

solution.referencestatement: SELECT id, name FROM Ingredients JOIN needsIngredient ON Ingredient.id = needsIngredient.iid JOIN Potions ON Potions.id = needsIngredient.pid WHERE Potions.name = 'Weak Health Potion'
